|| RULES ||
1. Don't be a bigot.
2. Don't post Bad.
3. Respect the Mods.
4. Be nice to new players.
5. Do not grief/rdm/etc.
6. Don't pick important (captain,etc) roles if you have no experience.
7. Do not ghost/metagame/etc.
8. Do not harass streamers if they are present.
|| RP INFO ||
This is classified as a Medium RP server. What that basically means is that ,unlike Heavy RP, sillyness is allowed and actively encouraged. But it must be within the confines of a character who has an in-character reason for being silly. Basically, have a reason for what you're doing. Be creative!
